title: 有關自己整合MOD的問題
author: mei801109
txt_content:
看中了不少MOD 想把它給整合但搞到最後卻崩潰了
想知道如何調查問題

用的是1.12.2基礎整合包 然後自己抓MOD安裝
目前有裝的MOD
少女前線 匠魂 拔刀劍 植物魔法 神秘時代 魔典蓋亞 虛擬人生 魔法雕像 暮色森林 天境2



我是WIN10 gtx1660
聽說電腦本身也有問題

WARNING: coremods are present:
  TabIconHackForgeLoadingPlugin ([?像破解]TabIconHackForge-1.0.jar)
  CorePlugin ([平滑字体]SmoothFont-1.12.2-1.15.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮??丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.7.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin ([??加速]MakeZoomZoom-0.0.4.jar)
  NetherPortalFixForgeLoadingPlugin ([防卡地??]NetherPortalFixForge-1.0.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.1.3.jar)
  JechCore ([拼音搜索]JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-2.3.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.9.9.1-1.12.2-anarchy.jar)
  DCLoadingPlugin (DummyCoreUnofficial-2.4.112.5.jar)
  CoreModBase ([查看?影盒]ShulkerBoxViewer-1.5-mc[1.11-1.12.2].jar)
  CoreModLoader ([3D?效]Sound-Physics-1.12.2.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R?整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

Time: 6/19/19 1:58 AM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail
